A tempest that is never shaken;: Not very quick. Uses magic to bring everyone else to his level;
不太灵活。通过魔法将别人拉到自己的水平
Her talent feeds her darker side;
她的才华滋养着她更黑暗的一面
Surprisingly sneaky for something so large;
对这么庞大的生物来说，竟然出奇地狡猾

column3: but you're in the way of her cleaning;

A tempest that is never shaken;: 通常很平和，但你挡了她打扫的路
Insane devotee of a dark god;
曾经是一块岩石，在那次事故之前

column3: so he likes to keep things interesting
column4: Both players draw 3 cards at the start of their turn;

A tempest that is never shaken;: 容易感到无聊，所以他喜欢保持事情的趣味性
column3: 双方在每回合开始时各抽三张牌
but really knows how to use it;

A tempest that is never shaken;: 拥有一把小剑，但她知道如何好好利用它
Will give you three wishes. And you'll like it.;
会给你三个愿望。而且你会喜欢它
在你眼前一点一点崩解
Traps flies. Spins webs. Some spider;
捕捉苍蝇，织网，一只蜘蛛
吞噬船只、海滨房产和冒险者
A goblin and his treasure are rarely parted;
哥布林和它的宝藏很少分开
Goblins and explosives: a dangerous combination;
哥布林和炸药：危险的组合
Half the time: brilliant. Half the time: on fire. Half the time: both.
一半的时间：天才。另一半的时间：着火。还有一半：两者兼具

column3: Every other turn causes you to dance
每隔一回合让你跳舞，自损伤害
many heads\\n Grow back after every turn\\n Fire and poison help;

A tempest that is never shaken;: 许多许多头\\n 每回合后都重新长出来\\n 火焰与毒药帮助
For destruction ice is also great;
Goblins use them like miners use canaries: if the kobolds start dropping
哥布林像矿工使用金丝雀一样使用它们：如果小妖怪开始倒下，说明附近一定有冒险者
Heart was two sizes too small. Made it easy to fit in a jar.;
心脏比正常尺寸小了两倍。让它很容易就能装进瓶子里
A conjuror of cheap tricks. And fireballs;
低级把戏的施法者。还有火球术
Tends a stone garden in her spare time;
像哥布林，但用了类固醇
Now you see him. Now you're on fire
现在你看到它。现在你着火了
Hears voices. They tell him to kill. To kill you.;
听到声音。它们告诉他要杀掉你
Enforcer of the ancient law: no two people are not on fire;
古老法则的执行者：没有人是没有着火的
Thinks you'd make a wonderful special friend;
认为你会是一个很棒的特别朋友

column3: Forbids most common card type in your hand;

A tempest that is never shaken;: 古老的谜语，中世纪的答案
column3: 禁止你手中大部分常见卡牌类型

一个非常非常不喜欢分享的同伴冒险者
God of storms. Not chained to a rock.;

The fastest draw in the dream;
寂静、静止、潜行，总是先手行动

Wishes it could be a real vampire;
希望自己能成为真正的吸血鬼

It's exactly as cold as its heart
它的冰冷正如它的心灵
Light in the wild\\n Flickering radiantly\\n Follow to your doom;
